title: Poster, "Poster for the Christo Project: Pont Neuf Empaquette [The Pont Neuf Wrapped], Paris, 1975-85", 1985
signed: In plate at upper left corner in black, and in plate, signed and dated in white, lower right corner.
inscribed: In white across lower edge of sheet in one unbroken line: CHRISTO/LE PONT NEUF EMPAQUETE/THE PONT NEUF WRAPPED/PARIS 1975-1985/PHOTO WOLFGANG VOLZ/C.V.3 CORPORATION 1985/NOUVELLES IMAGES 45700 LOMBREUIL-FRANCE/Dr. du Projet - JOHANNES SCHAUB/KC 48/ OFFSET PRINTED IN FRANCE
description: Color photographic image of the wrapped Pont Neuf in Paris. The bridge is strongly lit in the afternoon sun which contrasts with the large shadowy areas under the bridge.  The bridge is depicted on a strong diagonal across the sheet from left to right with reflections in the water at left and large, dark arches on the right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Poster for the Christo Project: Pont Neuf Empaquette [The Pont Neuf Wrapped], Paris, 1975-85", 1985.
1985. Offset lithograph. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-204.
